messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE NAME: The Veiled Venom Vendetta DATE: 11/11/53 The courtroom was engulfed in a silent tension as the trial unfolded. The prosecution called the officers central to the investigation to provide their testimonies. LAW ENFORCEMENT TESTIMONY: PROSECUTOR: Please state your name and your role in the investigation. WITNESS: I am Lieutenant A. B. Collins, the primary investigator of this case. PROSECUTOR: Thank you, Lieutenant Collins. Could you detail the events on the night the poisonous venom was unleashed? WITNESS: Certainly. On the night of August 8th, Officer C. D. Daniels reported a suspicious activity at the old warehouse. We launched an investigation immediately. PROSECUTOR: Who spearheaded the forensic analysis? WITNESS: Sergeant E. F. Edwards and Technician G. H. Foster were in charge of the forensic examination. PROSECUTOR: Who conducted the interrogations? WITNESS: Detectives I. J. Graham and K. L. Harrison undertook the interrogations of suspects and potential witnesses. PROSECUTOR: Thank you. No further questions. The Defense proceeded to cross-examine Lieutenant Collins on the investigative methods employed. In the ongoing trial, Patrol Officers M. N. Irving, O. P. Johnson, and Q. R. Kelly were also summoned to testify.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.
